DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Male female subject , 18 year age old time enrollment . Subjects meet medical condition percutaneous CTguided needle intervention . INR < 1.4 Written inform consent participate study . Ability comply requirement study procedure . Exclusion Criteria Subjects diagnose one follow accord medical record : Hemophilia , thrombocytopenia , coagulopathy , elevate risk bleed abnormal clotting , Pulmonary hypertension , heart failure , renal failure , blood dyscrasia Subjects treat Ticlopidine similar antithrombotic medication . Subjects tolerate mild sedation Subjects follow laboratory value , unless otherwise approve hematologist : Platelet count < 60,000/ml APTT > 39 sec PT > 15 sec Pregnancy lactation Subject unable comply requirement procedure , i.e . hold breath . Subject participation investigational trial within 30 day enrollment Subjects uncooperative follow instruction
